subject: Skeleton (Sport)
Sleds
lead_paragraph: Noelle Pikus-Pace of the United States was disqualified from her victory in the season-opening women’s World Cup skeleton event after her sled failed a post-race inspection.
snippet: Noelle Pikus-Pace of the United States was disqualified from her victory in the season-opening women’s World Cup skeleton event after her sled failed a post-race inspection.
